scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:webpack && npm run build:js:babel && npm run build:js:uglify
scripts.build:js:webpack: mkdir -p dist/js; webpack --devtool inline-source-map src/js/script.js --mode=development --output dist/js/script.js
scripts.build:js:babel: npx babel --presets env dist/js/script.js -s inline -o dist/js/script.js
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p dist; npx preprocess src/index.html -e package.json -d '{"commit":"'$(git log --pretty=format:'%h' -n 1)'", "time":"'$(date +%s)'"}' > dist/index.html; sed -i 's/type="module" //g' dist/index.html
